Series X

BMW X may refer to the following BMW crossovers, SAVs, and SACs: . BMW X1 (SUV based on 1 Series platform); BMW X2 (SUV with coupé roofline, based on X1 platform); BMW X3 (SUV based on 3 Series platform); BMW X4 (SUV with coupé roofline, based on X3 platform); BMW X5 (SUV based on 5 Series platform); BMW X6 (SUV with coupé roofline, based on X5 platform); BMW X7 (SUV based on 7 Series platform)

Read more on Wikipedia
